bibl.title: Territory of Washington V. Wilson D. Coyle. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: On motion of said defendant to require the Territory select upon which of the offenses in the indictment from in he will proceed- It appearing with Court that the indictment herein Charges an assault with intent to do bodily harm with a deadly weapon and arm and assault and battery - this ordered by the prosecution Territory of Washington and it hereby is required to select as to which of said offenses it will rely upon on there that and there upon in Territory of Washington its prosecuting attorney elect to rely upon said clause of a appeal and the Court permits said prosecuting attorney to elect Elect so for to time upon said assault with intent to do bodily harm or considerable prosecution therefore appearing under circumstance showing a wilful malignant and abandoned heart or above either of said offences There the said prosecution all that to body upon that part of this in charging and assault there before committed
showing a willful malignant and abandoned heart - not another as only which is There upon permitted and ordered accordingly
